glsa.title: Icecast denial of service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Icecast is vulnerable to a denial of service attack allowing remote users to crash the application.

background.p: Icecast is a program that streams audio data to listeners over the Internet.

description.p: There is an out-of-bounds read error in the web interface of Icecast when handling Basic Authorization requests. This vulnerability can theorically be exploited by sending a specially crafted Authorization header to the server.

impact.p: By exploiting this vulnerability, it is possible to crash the Icecast server remotely, resulting in a denial of service attack.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest available version of Icecast.
